transfer_functions.name: transferFrom
transfer_functions.description: Transfers tokens from a sender to a recipient.

other_functions.name: allowBurn
other_functions.description: Allows burning of tokens.

other_functions.name: allowance
other_functions.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend.

other_functions.name: approve
other_functions.description: Approves a spender to transfer tokens on behalf of the owner.

other_functions.name: balanceOf
other_functions.description: Returns the balance of an account.

other_functions.name: burn
other_functions.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens.

other_functions.name: burnFrom
other_functions.description: Burns tokens from a specified account.

other_functions.name: checkSignature
other_functions.description: Checks the validity of a signature.

other_functions.name: decimals
other_functions.description: Returns the number of decimals used by the token.

other_functions.name: decreaseAllowance
other_functions.description: Decreases the allowance of a spender.

other_functions.name: finishedVotings
other_functions.description: Returns the voting status for a digest.

other_functions.name: getFullOracleSet
other_functions.description: Returns the full oracle set.

other_functions.name: getNewBurnStatusId
other_functions.description: Returns the new burn status ID.

other_functions.name: getNewSetId
other_functions.description: Returns the ID of the new oracle set.

other_functions.name: getSwapDataId
other_functions.description: Returns the swap data ID for a given swap.

other_functions.name: increaseAllowance
other_functions.description: Increases the allowance of a spender.

other_functions.name: isOracle
other_functions.description: Checks if an address is an oracle.

other_functions.name: name
other_functions.description: Returns the name of the token.

other_functions.name: oraclesSet
other_functions.description: Returns the oracle set for a specific index.

other_functions.name: symbol
other_functions.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

other_functions.name: totalSupply
other_functions.description: Returns the total supply of the token.

other_functions.name: voteForMinting
other_functions.description: Votes for minting tokens based on swap data.

other_functions.name: voteForNewOracleSet
other_functions.description: Votes for a new oracle set.

other_functions.name: voteForSwitchBurn
other_functions.description: Votes for switching the burn status.
